channel.title: How do you make this manual drop down boxes like WoW have?
channel.description:
The box thing where you click the [ + ] thing and the content of it shows up, how do you make those??
Heres the site http://worldofwarcraft.com/index.xml
Click the [-](or if it has [ + ]) beside "Frostmourne Replica Unleashed" title. Thats what im talking about, how you get that??

item.title: How do you make this manual drop down boxes like WoW have?
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

javascript drop down menus google it but i think i might be wrong

Read full topic
